K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-001:1b-1: sad dharma r'a dza mah'a y'a na s'u tra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-001:1b-3: dam pa'i chos kyi rgyal po theg pa chen po'i mdo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-001:1b-4: de'i tshe na sangs rgyas shing s'a la gnyis kyi bar na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-001:2a-0: mya ngan las 'das par gshegs kar sems can thams cad brgya @2a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-001:2a-1: stong khri 'bum phal mang po kun shing gi drung na sangs rgyas 'khor bar bskor te 'khod nas mig ni /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-001:22a-10: gcig tu na de'i smyug ri gang las byung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-001:22a-12: de'i bar du mi de na tsha bas tshe srog zad zin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-001:22a-13: de'i 'og tu mda' phyung ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-001:22a-14: phan pa med par mngon no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-001:22a-16: sems mod bzhin du khrus shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-001:22a-20: 'du mched kyi rnams gtsang gdang na; yod pa la chags pa'i rnams dang bral te; chags pa med pa'i nang du chud par nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-001:22a-22: phyi mo sems can la bslabs te sman bzang po 'di bshad de nad kyi rnams gsos la kun sos par 'tshal lo; ;yang gcig tu na chos kyi yi ge 'di'i rdo rje'i shes rab kyi ral gris sems can rnams kyi ma rig pa'i yid breg go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-001:22a-23: yang gcig tu na chos kyi yi ge 'di gtsang gdang ba'i chos spyad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-001:22a-24: sems can rnams kyi gdug pa gsum gyi dri ma brdab cing bsal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-001:22a-25: yang gcig tu na chos kyi yi ge 'di shes rab kyi stobs po che spyad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-001:22b-0: sems can dkris pa @22b bcus bcings pa grol thar par 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-001:22b-1: yang gcig tu na chos kyi yi ge 'di ngo bo nyid gtsang gdang bar gcig tu spyad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-001:22b-2: sems can gyi rnams kun gyi lus gcig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-001:22b-6: gtsang gdang pa gcig thob ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-001:22b-7: theg pa tshigs kyi nang du chud yang dag par 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-001:22b-8: sems sems can dmyal ba nas thar yang dag par 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-001:22b-9: sems can dmyal ba nas thar yang dag par 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-001:22b-10: bdag gi sems can gyi rnams bsgral ba'i ra mda' nus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-001:22b-11: sems can gyi rnams sems can dmyal ba rnams su ltung na bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi sku lus nub cing med par bgyis lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-001:22b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di bdag la gtad cing gdams par smon to; ;bdag la'ang sems can rgya cher sgrol ba bshad de sems can gyi rnams thos pa nyung la shes pa mang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-001:22b-13: mthong ba nyung la rig pa mang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-001:22b-14: yi ge'i ri mo mang du ma 'tshal par gzhung gi mngon rtags thob ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-001:22b-15: chos nyung dus yang dag par grol thar la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-001:22b-16: gzhan dogs pa 'dri ba ma mchis par bgyi na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-001:22b-17: sangs rgyas kyis byams shing thugs rjes gzigs te bdag [?] pa sgos to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-001:22b-18: sangs rgyas kyis phal mang po la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-001:23a-0: blang dor [?] chos kyi rgyal po 'dis bskal pa brgya stong khri 'bum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la yon @23a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-001:23a-2: thabs [?] mda' bya zhing bsgral nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-001:23a-3: byang chub sems dpa' 'dis ro bro ba'i rlung spyad de sems can rnams kyi srog mthud nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-001:23a-4: khyed la sogs pa da lta'i dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-001:23a-5: ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi sems can rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'di'i ming gzungs su bzung gi steng du dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po gyis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-001:23a-6: mya ngan las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong par grol thar pa thogs pa med pa thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-001:23a-7: de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal pos sa la gtugs te phyag btsal nas langs te de'i gzhi nas mya ngan las 'das pa chen por zhugs na stong pas grol thar pa go ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-001:23a-8: chags pa med pa'i sa las rkang pa bteg pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-001:23a-9: rkang pa bor ba kun kyang gtsang gdang ba bsgrod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-001:23a-10: thal mo sbyar nas sangs rgyas la phyag btsal te song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-001:23a-11: dam pa'i chos kyi rgyal po'i yi ge bam po gcig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-001:23a-13: sngon rgya las 'gyur ba'i yig rnying skad gsar gyis ma bcos par snang /
